page.title: 08A DAY IN THE LIFE OF RACHEL
page.content: I am Rachel.I live in a small village called Crick. {A typical wednesday.}I wake when Mum calls,usually 7.30a.m.I get up and have breakfast:-cereals and a cup of tea. After breakfast I get dressed and pack my bag and swimming bag.I leave for school at 8.45 and run round to Heather's.We walk to our school. I like school. Lessons start at 8.55 with the headmistress taking Assembly, then its English till break. I stay in to finish off.Then it's maths till 12.00.Time to wash our hands and have dinner.I have sandwiches. After dinner I practise the treble recorder.At 1.15 we go swimming at Daventry Nene Pool returning at 3.15 after a 15 min coach ride.Then I play the London game until home time. Today Julie and Clare come to play till 7.30 then I watch T.V. until bed time.
